name: Crazy Mad Goat Simulator - Wild Head Attack mode Game Free
name_original: Crazy Mad Goat Simulator - Wild Head Attack mode Game Free
description:
Crazy Mad Goat Simulator is out of the farm and he is mad... Break as many pipes as you can without hitting them. Get your highest score and share it with friends on Facebook and Twitter. Compete with other players in Game Center.

Game Features:

- 8-bit art style and retro look

- Play with just a tap

- Very fast game play

- Not easy and challenging, but hardly impossible

- Game Center integrated for more fun

- Great for everyone: if you’d like to get some stress out, or just love old school and mini games, or you’re just a kid – Crazy Mad Goat Simulator will be great for you
